mapper.sql: id, goods_attribute_id, goods_category_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag
mapper.select: select DISTINCT a.id from pm_goods_rel_attribute_category a inner join pm_goods_attribute_value b on a.goods_attribute_id = b.product_attribute_id and b.is_custom = 0 where b.del_flag = 0 and b.is_custom = 0 and a.goods_attribute_id = #{goodsAttributeId} limit 2

select b.id,a.name,a.content as value from pm_goods_attribute a,pm_goods b,pm_goods_category c,pm_goods_rel_attribute_category d where b.id = #{goodsId} and b.goods_category_id = c.id and c.id = d.goods_category_id and a.id = d.goods_attribute_id and a.del_flag =0 and b.del_flag = 0 and c.del_flag =0 and d.del_flag = 0 and a.type = 6;

select DISTINCT a.id from pm_goods_rel_attribute_category a inner join pm_goods_attribute b on a.goods_attribute_id = b.id and b.del_flag = 0 and b.type = 6 where a.del_flag =0 and a.goods_attribute_id = #{goodsAttributeId} limit 2

select DISTINCT a.id from pm_goods_rel_attribute_category a inner join pm_goods_attribute b on a.goods_attribute_id = b.id and b.del_flag = 0 and b.type = 3 where a.del_flag =0 and a.goods_attribute_id = #{goodsAttributeId} limit 2
